languages.text: "{name}, нам нужно поговорить!" {n}Ирлиэт залетает в кабинет подобно порыву освежающего ветра. Лицо ее полнится не то радостью, не то волнением.{/n} "Я осознала кое-то важное, и только ты сможешь меня понять!"

"{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"
languages.original_text: "{name}, нам нужно поговорить!" {n}Ирлиэт залетает в кабинет подобно порыву освежающего ветра. Лицо ее полнится не то радостью, не то волнением.{/n} "Я осознала кое-то важное, и только ты сможешь меня понять!"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your office like a gust of refreshing wind. Her face is beaming with a mix of anxiety and happiness.{/n} "I have just realized something very important and only you will be able to understand me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，我们必须谈谈！”{n}伊莉耶特仿佛一阵清风般闯进了你的书房。{/n}“我刚刚意识到一件非常重要的事，只有你能理解我的意思！”
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}，我们必须谈谈！”{n}伊莉耶特仿佛一阵清风般闯进了你的书房。{/n}“我刚刚意识到一件非常重要的事，只有你能理解我的意思！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡{name}, tenemos que hablar!». {n}Yrliet irrumpe en tu estudio como un vigorizante soplo de aire. Su rostro está iluminado con una mezcla de agitación y felicidad.{/n} «¡Acabo de darme cuenta de algo muy importante, y tú eres {mf|el único|la única} que sabrá comprenderme!».
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}, tenemos que hablar!». {n}Yrliet irrumpe en tu estudio como un vigorizante soplo de aire. Su rostro está iluminado con una mezcla de agitación y felicidad.{/n} «¡Acabo de darme cuenta de algo muy importante, y tú eres {mf|el único|la única} que sabrá comprenderme!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, j'ai quelque chose à vous dire ! » {n}Telle une brise rafraîchissante, Yrliet s'engouffre dans votre bureau. Son visage est illuminé par un mélange d'excitation et de bonheur.{/n} « Je viens de réaliser quelque chose de très important et il n'y a que vous qui puissiez me comprendre ! »
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: « {name}, j'ai quelque chose à vous dire ! » {n}Telle une brise rafraîchissante, Yrliet s'engouffre dans votre bureau. Son visage est illuminé par un mélange d'excitation et de bonheur.{/n} « Je viens de réaliser quelque chose de très important et il n'y a que vous qui puissiez me comprendre ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, wir müssen reden!" {n}Yrliet stürmt in dein Arbeitszimmer wie ein belebender Windstoß. Ihr Gesicht strahlt in einer Mischung aus Aufregung und Zufriedenheit.{/n} "Ich habe soeben etwas sehr Wichtiges erkannt, und nur Ihr seid in der Lage, mich zu verstehen!"
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, wir müssen reden!" {n}Yrliet stürmt in dein Arbeitszimmer wie ein belebender Windstoß. Ihr Gesicht strahlt in einer Mischung aus Aufregung und Zufriedenheit.{/n} "Ich habe soeben etwas sehr Wichtiges erkannt, und nur Ihr seid in der Lage, mich zu verstehen!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、話がある！」{n}爽やかな突風のように、ユリエットがあなたの書斎に駆け込んでくる。彼女の顔は動揺と嬉しさの入り混じった表情で輝いている。{/n}「今、とても重要なことに気づいた。それに、我のことを理解できるのはお前だけなのだ！」
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、話がある！」{n}爽やかな突風のように、ユリエットがあなたの書斎に駆け込んでくる。彼女の顔は動揺と嬉しさの入り混じった表情で輝いている。{/n}「今、とても重要なことに気づいた。それに、我のことを理解できるのはお前だけなのだ！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: ", we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

languages.text: "Konuşmamız gerek {name}!" {n}Yrliet, canlı bir fırtına misali çalışma odana dalıyor. Yüzü, endişe ve mutlulukla parlıyor.{/n} "Çok önemli bir şey fark ettim. Beni sadece sen anlayabilirsin!"
languages.original_text: "{name}, we need to talk!" {n}Yrliet rushes into your study like an invigorating gust of wind. Her face is beaming with a mixture of agitation and happiness.{/n} "I have just realised something very important, and only you will be able to understand me!"

traits.locale_text: "Konuşmamız gerek {name}!" {n}Yrliet, çalışma odana canlı bir fırtına gibi dalıyor. Yüzü, endişe ve mutlulukla parlıyor.{/n} "Çok önemli bir şey fark ettim ve beni sadece sen anlayabilirsin!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
